description: The file 'Serialization.cpp' contains implementations of string conversions, encoding utilities (hex, base64), UTF-16/CodePoint conversions, and related serialization utilities within the WPEFramework namespace.

methods.name: ToString(const wchar_t[], std::string&)
methods.description: Converts wide character strings to std::string using wcstombs.

methods.name: ToString(const char[], std::wstring&)
methods.description: Converts C-style char arrays to std::wstring using mbstowcs.

methods.name: ToString(const wchar_t[], unsigned int)
methods.description: Converts a wchar_t array with specified length to std::string, considering _UNICODE mode.

methods.name: ToString(const char[], unsigned int)
methods.description: Converts char array with specified length to std::string, considering _UNICODE mode.

methods.name: EXTERNAL ToHexString(const uint8_t[], const uint16_t, string&)
methods.description: Converts a byte array to a hex string representation.

methods.name: EXTERNAL FromHexString(const string&, uint8_t*, const uint16_t)
methods.description: Parses a hex string into a byte array.

methods.name: ToString(const uint8_t[], const uint16_t, const bool, string&)
methods.description: Encodes a byte array into a Base64 string.

methods.name: FromString(const string&, uint8_t[], uint16_t&, const TCHAR*)
methods.description: Decodes a Base64 string into a byte array, with optional ignore list.

methods.name: CodePointToUTF16(const uint32_t, uint16_t&, uint16_t&)
methods.description: Encodes a Unicode code point into UTF-16 surrogate pairs.

methods.name: UTF16ToCodePoint(const uint16_t, const uint16_t, uint32_t&)
methods.description: Decodes UTF-16 surrogate pairs into a Unicode code point.

methods.name: ToCodePoint(const TCHAR*, uint8_t, uint32_t&)
methods.description: Extracts a Unicode code point from a UTF-8 encoded string segment.

methods.name: FromCodePoint(uint32_t, TCHAR*, uint8_t)
methods.description: Encodes a Unicode code point into UTF-8.

methods.name: ToQuotedString(const TCHAR, const string&)
methods.description: Creates a quoted string with internal quote escaping.

methods.name: bool CodePointToUTF16(const uint32_t codePoint,uint16_t & lowPart,uint16_t & highPart)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: int8_t FromCodePoint(uint32_t codePoint,TCHAR * data,const uint8_t length)
methods.description: unavailable
